sentences.en: A plausible idea, but will it work in practice?
sentences.cn: 主意倒好, 然而能实行 吗 ?

sentences.en: Although that distinction seems artificial, the result was surely plausible.
sentences.cn: 尽管这一区分看似人为做作, 但结果肯定是有理的.

sentences.en: As always when he spoke, he sounded so plausible.
sentences.cn: 他还是像往常那样,话说得似乎很有道理.

sentences.en: Great love makes It'seem reasonable, sometimes plausible, but never satisfactory.
sentences.cn: 有了伟大的爱情,它还能显得合理, 有时还似乎是可行的, 但绝对不是令人满意的.

sentences.en: He has a very plausible way of talking; sometimes he talks with the tongue in the cheek.
sentences.cn: 他讲起话来非常动听, 但 有时话中有话.

sentences.en: He was so plausible that he conned everybody.
sentences.cn: 他那么会花言巧语，以至于骗过了所有的人。
她的说辞听起来言之有理。
她的说辞听起来言之有理。
他的叙述听上去当然很合理。
他说的那番话似乎是真实的.

sentences.en: I stood still, trying to invent a plausible excuse.
sentences.cn: 我站着不动，试图编个说得过去的借口。

sentences.en: She has a plausible [ sharp; quick ] tongue.
sentences.cn: 她有一张巧 [ 利; 快 ] 嘴.

sentences.en: Some of the ideas are very intriguing and sound intuitively plausible.
sentences.cn: 有些想法非常吸引人，听起来觉得很有道理。

sentences.en: That explanation seems entirely plausible to me.
sentences.cn: 那个解释在我看来完全说得通。

sentences.en: This explanation fits the facts and is psychologically plausible.
sentences.cn: 这一解释与事实相符,从心理角度看也有理.

sentences.en: We now have to provide a plausible reason for these rules.
sentences.cn: 现在就必须对这些定则作出合理的解释.

words.tran_cn: 喝采的；似乎真实可信的（等于plausible）
善辩；似乎有理；貌似可信

trans.tran_cn: 貌似真实的，貌似有理的，花言巧语的，有眉有眼
trans.tran_en: reasonable and likely to be true or successful
